title: Smarter Hole Targeting in Leginon
content: Over the past decade, single particle analysis (SPA) of cryo-EM micrographs has become one of the dominant methods for protein structure determination Data collection is now nearly exclusively done using automated software packages, such as Leginon [1], SerialEM [2], EPU (Thermo Fisher), and Latitude (Gatan). These packages need to be able to control the microscope and camera, and need to be able to find the ideal targets for imaging.
